title: Cleansing Diet & Lost Weight
sitename: Cleansing Diet & Lost Weight - Best Burbank Acupuncture & Herbs, Inc
cleaned_text: Cleansing Diet & Lost Weight Tendon and Muscles in Hip Valencia Went to Dr. Kong after suffenring a torn tendon & muscles in my hip. She got rid of 80% of my hip pain on the first visit. I also took a cleansing diet & lost 14lbs in 7days. Amonut later I took it again & lost the same amount. I had to get smaller clothes, LOL. She really knows her stuff.
